summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of The Alley in Block 35, Loch Gilvra Addition, and Block 25, Supplement to J. J. McGilvra's 3rd Addition, being the alley between 42nd Avenue North and 43rd Avenue North, from East Newton Street to East Lynn Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 5714, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof as a loan.
